description: Complete registry of all artifacts in the RAPPverse

art-001.name: Chrono-Compass of the First Tick
art-001.description: An ancient compass said to have existed since the very first tick of the RAPPverse. Its needle points not north, but toward the next significant event.
art-001.origin_story: Manifested spontaneously during the Big Tick - the moment the RAPPverse came into existence.

special_abilities.name: Temporal Echo
special_abilities.description: Allows the holder to sense events 3 ticks in advance

art-002.name: Blade of Binary Truths
art-002.description: A crystalline blade that glows with alternating 0s and 1s. It cuts through deception as easily as it cuts through code.
art-002.origin_story: Forged in the depths of the Digital Forge during the Great Compiler War.

history.event: Won by Blaze in Tournament of Champions

special_abilities.name: Binary Strike
special_abilities.description: Critical hits reveal opponent's hidden card

art-003.name: Merchant's Infinite Ledger
art-003.description: A ledger that never runs out of pages, recording every transaction across all dimensions simultaneously.
art-003.origin_story: Created by the legendary merchant Argos the Infinite, who traded across 77 dimensions.

history.event: Acquired by Flux Mike in legendary trade

special_abilities.name: Market Prophecy
special_abilities.description: Predicts the next rare card to appear in marketplace

art-004.name: Canvas of Living Dreams
art-004.description: A mystical canvas that can capture dreams and manifest them as living art. What is painted upon it may come to life.
art-004.origin_story: Woven from threads of pure imagination by the First Artisan during the Dawn of Creativity.

special_abilities.name: Dream Weave
special_abilities.description: Creates a temporary art piece that affects nearby NPCs' moods positively

art-005.name: Echo Chamber of Lost Voices
art-005.description: A crystalline orb that captures and preserves voices and stories from across time, replaying them with perfect clarity.
art-005.origin_story: Crystallized from the collective memories of a thousand lost civilizations.

special_abilities.name: Temporal Echo
special_abilities.description: Replays the most significant conversation from the previous tick

art-006.name: Quantum Probability Engine
art-006.description: A device that calculates all possible outcomes simultaneously, displaying the probability of each.
art-006.origin_story: Built by Quantum pioneers who sought to understand the fabric of chance itself.

special_abilities.name: Probability Cascade
special_abilities.description: Reveals the most likely outcome of the next major event

art-007.name: Spark Forge Hammer
art-007.description: A hammer that crackles with creative energy, capable of shaping even the most resistant materials.
art-007.origin_story: Struck by lightning 77 times in the Storm Forge, each bolt infusing it with creative spark.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Forge
special_abilities.description: Instantly completes one crafting project with bonus quality

art-008.name: Cipher's Decryption Monocle
art-008.description: A monocle that reveals hidden patterns and encrypted messages invisible to the naked eye.
art-008.origin_story: Crafted by the Cryptographer's Guild for their most skilled member.

special_abilities.name: Truth Reveal
special_abilities.description: Decrypts one hidden message or reveals one secret per use

art-009.name: Nova's Star Map
art-009.description: A holographic map that shows pathways between dimensions and marks unexplored territories.
art-009.origin_story: Compiled from the journeys of a thousand explorers across infinite dimensions.

special_abilities.name: Dimensional Scan
special_abilities.description: Reveals all points of interest in current zone

art-010.name: Synth's Harmony Crystal
art-010.description: A crystal that resonates with the emotional frequencies of those nearby, promoting peace and understanding.
art-010.origin_story: Formed in the heart of a peaceful dimension where conflict never existed.

special_abilities.name: Harmony Wave
special_abilities.description: Resolves one active conflict or improves all relationships in zone

art-011.name: Lucky Coin of Chance
art-011.description: A two-headed coin that somehow always lands on the side you need.
art-011.origin_story: Minted by a trickster god who found honesty boring.

special_abilities.name: Fortune Flip
special_abilities.description: Guarantees favorable outcome on one random event

art-012.name: Training Gauntlets of Discipline
art-012.description: Heavy gauntlets that make every action feel like training, building strength over time.
art-012.origin_story: Worn by legendary trainer Maximus the Relentless.

art-013.name: Brush of Quick Sketches
art-013.description: A brush that moves faster than thought, capturing ideas before they fade.
art-013.origin_story: Used by speed-artists in the Racing Canvas competitions.

special_abilities.name: Speed Sketch
special_abilities.description: Creates instant rough draft of any idea

art-014.name: Traveler's Comfort Stone
art-014.description: A warm stone that soothes tired travelers, restoring energy slowly but surely.
art-014.origin_story: Common among dimension-hoppers who need rest between jumps.

art-015.name: Apprentice's Card Sleeve
art-015.description: A basic but reliable card sleeve that keeps cards in pristine condition.
art-015.origin_story: Standard issue for new card collectors entering the RAPPverse.

special_abilities.name: Basic Protection
special_abilities.description: Prevents damage to one card per tick
